item.title: PagerDuty Notifications
item.description: Configuration 1. Create a service in PagerDuty Log into your PagerDuty account. Navigate to Configuration > Services. Click Add New Services. Type a name for the service and select your incident settings. For Integration Type, click the Select a Tool dropdown > Netuitive. Finish all other settings and click Add Service. Copy the Integration Key provided. This is needed to set up a new PagerDuty notification in Metricly.

item.title: Slack Notifications
item.description: Configuration 1. Install Incoming Webhooks on Slack If you’ve already installed the Incoming Webhooks app, you can skip to step 2. Go to Slack’s app directory. Search for Incoming Webhooks. It should dynamically update a drop-down beneath the search bar. Click Incoming Webhooks. Click Add Configuration. Select a channel from Choose a Channel… or create a new one. Click Add Incoming WebHooks Integration. 2.
